mapper.select: SELECT his.id,his.user_id,u.nickname,dt.unit_name,dt.sub_unit_name,his.submit_time FROM t_survey_history his INNER JOIN t_app_user u ON u.id = his.user_id LEFT JOIN t_app_user_detail dt ON dt.user_id = u.id WHERE his.meet_id = #{meetId}

SELECT i.answer as selAnswer,u.nickname FROM t_survey_history_item i LEFT JOIN t_survey_question q ON q.id = i.question_id LEFT JOIN t_survey_history h ON h.id = i.history_id INNER JOIN t_app_user u ON u.id = h.user_id WHERE i.question_id = #{questionId} GROUP BY h.user_id

SELECT his.user_id as id,i.question_id,q.sort,i.answer as selAnswer from t_survey_history his LEFT JOIN t_survey_history_item i on i.history_id = his.id LEFT JOIN t_survey_question q ON q.id = i.question_id WHERE his.meet_id=#{meetId} and his.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY i.question_id

SELECT his.user_id,u.nickname,dt.unit_name,dt.sub_unit_name,h.`level`,dt.title,u.province, u.city,grp.group_name,m.meet_name,his.submit_time FROM t_survey_history his LEFT JOIN t_meet m ON m.id = his.meet_id INNER JOIN t_app_user u on u.id = his.user_id LEFT JOIN t_app_user_detail dt on dt.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN t_hospital h ON h.id = dt.hos_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT g.group_name,ug.doctor_id from t_user_group g LEFT JOIN t_user_doctor_group ug ON ug.pub_user_id = g.pub_user_id AND ug.group_id = g.id WHERE ug.pub_user_id = #{userId}) grp ON grp.doctor_id = his.user_id WHERE his.meet_id=#{meetId}
